<noinclude>
This is the Ultraviolett Visuell template.
</noinclude>
<includeonly><tr>
<td>{{DisplayMolecule|{{{anl|}}} }}</td>
<td>{{{anl conc|}}}</td>
<td>{{DisplayMolecule|{{{solv|}}} }}</td>
<td property="hidden">{{{solv vol|}}}</td>
<td>{{DisplayMolecule|{{{additives|}}} }}</td>
<td property="hidden">{{{additives conc|}}}</td>
<td>{{{absorption_max|}}}</td>
<td>{{{absorption_intensity_max|}}}</td>
<td>{{{emission_max|}}}</td>
<td>{{{emission_intensity_max|}}}</td>

<td property="hidden">{{{absorption_max_2|}}}</td>
<td property="hidden">{{{absorption_intensity_max_2|}}}</td>
<td property="hidden">{{{emission_max_2|}}}</td>
<td property="hidden">{{{emission_intensity_max_2|}}}</td>

<td property="hidden">{{{absorption_max_3|}}}</td>
<td property="hidden">{{{absorption_intensity_max_3|}}}</td>
<td property="hidden">{{{emission_max_3|}}}</td>
<td property="hidden">{{{emission_intensity_max_3|}}}</td>

<td>{{{interception_number|}}}</td>
<td>{{{interception|}}}</td>

<td>{{#expr: 1240 / {{#convertQuantity:{{{interception|}}}|property=Interception|form=Ultraviolett_Visuell_experiments }} round 2 }}</td>

<td>{{{additives_absorption|}}}</td>
<td>{{{intensity_absorption|}}}</td>

<td>{{{gas|}}}</td>
<td property="hidden">{{{temp|}}}</td>

<td property="hidden">{{{condition|}}}</td>
<td property="hidden">{{{details|}}}</td>
<td property="hidden">{{{include|}}}</td>

<td>{{#subobject:
 |Analyte={{{anl|}}}
 |Analyte concentration={{{anl conc|}}}
 |Solvent A={{{solv|}}}
 |Solvent volume={{{solv vol|}}}
 |Additives={{{additives|}}}
 |Additives concentration={{#convertQuantityByFactor:{{{additives conc|}}}|factor=0.001 }}
 |Absorption Max={{{absorption_max|}}}
 |Absorption Intensity Max={{{absorption_intensity_max|}}}
 |Emission Max={{{emission_max|}}}
 |Emission Intensity Max={{{emission_intensity_max|}}}
 |Absorption Max={{{absorption_max_2|}}}
 |Absorption Intensity Max={{{absorption_intensity_max_2|}}}
 |Emission Max={{{emission_max_2|}}}
 |Emission Intensity Max={{{emission_intensity_max_2|}}}
 |Absorption Max={{{absorption_max_3|}}}
 |Absorption Intensity Max={{{absorption_intensity_max_3|}}}
 |Emission Max={{{emission_max_3|}}}
 |Emission Intensity Max={{{emission_intensity_max_3|}}}
 |Interception number={{{interception_number|}}}
 |Interception={{{interception|}}}
 |Additives absorption={{{additives_absorption|}}}
 |Intensity Additives absorption={{{intensity_absorption|}}}
 |Gas={{{gas|}}}
 |TemperatureP={{{temp|}}}
 |E0={{#expr: 1240 / {{#convertQuantity:{{{interception|}}}|property=Interception|form=Ultraviolett_Visuell_experiments }} round 2 }}
 |Condition={{{condition|}}}
 |Details={{{details|}}}
 |Included={{{include|}}}
 |BasePageName={{BASEPAGENAME}}
}}</td></tr></includeonly>
